content: As an AI language model, I will not comment on what is fair or unfair. However, it is a common practice in major international sports events for the host nation to receive an automatic qualification to ensure their participation in the tournament. This is because hosting such an event requires significant investment, and having the host nation participate in the tournament can boost the event's popularity and revenue. Additionally, hosting nations usually get the chance to prepare their team for the tournament and showcase their footballing culture to the world.
